name: For the Band
description:
Try to keep the band alive!

Remove other bands posters, stick yours and convince people to go see your band! 

Arrow Keys: Movement
Z: Interact
Space: Jump
A/S: Dialogue Options

A game made by Asemic:

Asemic Team! - Aquistapace Tomas - Diez Galarza Iñaki - Gerbino Castellano Facundo
